method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _open_audio
method.comment: OPEN AUDIO WITH DEFAULT PLAYER

method.name: _open_googlemaps1
method.comment: OPENS THE GOOGLE MAPS APP WITH A PLACE (CAN USE LAT,LONG) EG Mexico

method.name: _open_googlemaps2
method.comment: OPENS THE GOOGLE MAPS APP WITH A DISTANCE PLACE TO PLACE (CAN USE LAT,LONG) EG Mexico,EUA

method.name: _open_video
method.comment: OPEN VIDEO WITH DEFAULT PLAYER

method.name: _open_website
method.comment: Open the default browser with url informed

method.name: _openapp_googleplay
method.comment: OPENS THE LINK FOR APPLICATION ON GOOGLE PLAY, GENERALLY USED AS RATE APPLICATIONS Example com.example.app

method.name: _openchannel_youtube
method.comment: Open youtube app with a specific channel Example Basic4android

method.name: _opencompany_googleplay
method.comment: OPENS THE COMPANY LINK ON GOOGLE PLAY LISTING ALL APPS Example ID DESENVOLVIMENTO

method.name: _openpage_facebook
method.comment: OPENS A PAGE ON FACEBOOK

method.name: _openpage_twitter
method.comment: OPENS A PAGE OR SPECIFICS PROFILE ON TWITTER

method.name: _openvideo_youtube
method.comment: Open youtube app with a specific video Example MmLhGVxN76A

method.name: _search_youtube
method.comment: Open youtube app with the result of search Example Funny Videos

method.name: _send_email
method.comment: SEND EMAIL VIA INTENT

method.name: _send_sms
method.comment: SEND SMS VIA INTENT

method.name: _share_audio
method.comment: SHARE ANY AUDIO VIA INTENT AUDIO FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _share_file
method.comment: SHARE ANY FILE VIA INTENT THE FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _share_textandimage
method.comment: SHARE TEXT AND IMAGE VIA INTENT

method.name: _shareaudio_dropbox
method.comment: SHARE IMAGE ON DROPBOX APP IMAGE FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _shareaudio_googledrive
method.comment: SHARE AUDIO ON GOOGLE DRIVE APP AUDIO FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _shareaudio_hangouts
method.comment: SHARE AUDIO ON Hangouts APP AUDIO FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _shareaudio_line
method.comment: SHARE AUDIO ON LINE APP AUDIO FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _shareaudio_messenger
method.comment: SHARE AUDIO ON MESSENGER APP AUDIO FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _shareaudio_skype
method.comment: SHARE AUDIO ON Skype APP AUDIO FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _shareaudio_whatsapp
method.comment: SHARE A AUDIO ON WHATSAPP AUDIO FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OR File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _sharefile_bluetooth
method.comment: SHARE FILE ON Bluetooth FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _sharefile_dropbox
method.comment: SHARE FILE ON DROPBOX APP TEXT FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.comment: SHARE FILE ON GOOGLE DRIVE APP FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.comment: SHARE FILE ON Hangouts APP FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.comment: SHARE FILE ON MESSENGER APP FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.comment: SHARE FILE ON Skype APP FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _sharefile_wifidirectsamsung
method.comment: SHARE FILE ON WIFIDIRECT APP (Samsung Devices) FILE MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _sharemultiple_images
method.comment: SHARE MULTIPLE IMAGES Example ShareMultiple_Images(Array As String(File.Combine(File.DirRootExternal, "img1.png"), File.Combine(File.DirRootExternal, "img2.jpg"))) IMAGES FILES MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _sharemultiplefiles_dropbox
method.comment: SHARE MULTIPLE FILES ON DROPBOX APP Example ShareMultipleFiles_DropBox(Array As String(File.Combine(File.DirRootExternal, "img1.png"), File.Combine(File.DirRootExternal, "img2.jpg"))) FILES MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal

method.name: _sharemultiplefiles_googledrive
method.comment: SHARE MULTIPLE FILES ON GOOGLE DRIVE APP Example ShareMultipleFiles_GoogleDrive(Array As String(File.Combine(File.DirRootExternal, "img1.png"), File.Combine(File.DirRootExternal, "img2.jpg"))) FILES MUST BE IN THE FOLDER EXTERNAL File.DirDefaultExternal OU File.DirRootExternal
